content.webTitle: Bill and Hillary Clinton's cat Socks has died at age 19

fields.headline: Farewell, Socks
fields.bodyText: The Clinton family's White House cat, Socks, has died at age 20 of throat cancer. "Socks brought much happiness to Chelsea and us over the years, and enjoyment to kids and cat lovers everywhere," the Clintons said in a statement. "We're grateful for those memories, and we especially want to thank our good friend, Betty Currie, for taking such loving care of Socks for so many years."
